original_text: Instead, you should understand that the Lord Almighty has all authority. You should respect him as holy and be afraid of him.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와 그를 너희가 거룩하다 하고 그를 너희가 두려워하며 무서워 할 자로 삼으라

sentences.original_text: that the Lord Almighty has all authority
sentences.korean_translation: 전능하신 주께서 모든 권위를 가지고 계심을

sentences.original_text: You should respect him as holy
sentences.korean_translation: 당신은 그를 거룩하신 분으로 존중해야 합니다
